<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 0"
    pfs=""
>
[Alcohol](/Equipment.aspx?ID=622)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Drug" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=261" />
<trait label="Ingested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Poison" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=126" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 120</row>

**Price** 1 cp (or more)

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Alcohol is a common substance available in stunning variety. The Price of a dose of alcohol depends on the specific beverage. You can’t recover from the [sickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34) condition from alcohol while affected.

 If you fail a saving throw against alcohol other than initial saves, the affliction’s stage doesn’t increase; the only way to increase the stage of alcohol’s affliction is to consume more alcohol.

**Saving Throw** DC 12 Fortitude; **Onset** 10 minutes; **Stage 1** +1 item bonus to saving throws against [fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68) effects (10 minutes); **Stage 2** [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16), +1 item bonus to saving throws against fear effects (10 minutes); **Stage 3** [clumsy 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=3), flat-footed, [stupefied 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=37) (10 minutes); **Stage 4** clumsy 2 and sickened 2 (10 minutes); **Stage 5** clumsy 2, sickened 2, and stupefied 2 (10 minutes); **Stage 6** [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38) (8 hours); **Stage 7** death

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

Stage 1: +1 item bonus to saving throws against [fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68) effects (10 minutes)

Stage 2: [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16), +1 item bonus to saving throws against fear effects (10 minutes)

Stage 3: [clumsy 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=3), flat-footed, [stupefied 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=37) (10 minutes)

Stage 4: clumsy 2 and sickened 2 (10 minutes)

Stage 5: clumsy 2, sickened 2, and stupefied 2 (10 minutes)

Stage 6: [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38) (8 hours)

Stage 7: death
